title: Building arbitrage-free implied volatility: Sinkhorn's algorithm and variants. (arXiv:1902.04456v3 [q-fin.CP] UPDATED)
abstract: We consider the classical problem of building an arbitrage-free implied volatility surface from bid-ask quotes. We design a fast numerical procedure, for which we prove the convergence, based on the Sinkhorn algorithm that has been recently used to solve efficiently (martingale) optimal transport problems.

translated_title: 构建无套利隐含波动率的Sinkhorn算法及其变种
translated_abstract: 我们考虑从买卖报价中构建无套利隐含波动率曲面的经典问题。我们设计了一个快速的数值过程，通过Sinkhorn算法实现。我们证明了该算法的收敛性，Sinkhorn算法最近被用于高效地解决(鞅)最优输运问题。
tldr: 该论文介绍了一种使用Sinkhorn算法及其变种构建无套利隐含波动率曲面的快速数值过程，同时证明了该算法的收敛性。
